DOC.detailed_description: This study double-blinded , randomize , placebo-controlled , pilot study subject pre-diabetes randomize receive either placebo Cranberry extract total 8 week treatment . Each subject continue dosage cranberry extract match placebo entire duration treatment . Comparisons insulin sensitivity , endothelial function , marker inflmmation oxidative stress make 2 group pre post intervention .
